attributes.action: Close the house of lords as it is outdated and not democratic.
attributes.additional_details: I am pretty sure the majority of people in the UK will know what this petition is about.
attributes.background:
This is a petition to close the house of lords as it is an outdated
misused money pit for unelected persons that are not in touch with
the British people.. 
Time to save our country millions that have been wasted by the 
intervention of these unelected people...
